original: @ga   /rdo rje theg pa'i rtsha ba dang yan lag gi ltung🔽ba'i bshags pa bzhugs so//
analyzed: @ga   /rdo rje theg pa'i rtsha ba dang yan lag gi ltung ba'i bshags pa bzhugs so//
translated: Confession of Downfalls in the Vajrayāna🔽Hūṃ. Vajra master, awareness partner,

original: @##/_/hum rdo rje slob dpon rig mar mtshhungs pa dang /_/rtsha ba'i
analyzed: @##/_/hum rdo rje slob dpon rig mar mtshhungs pa dang /_/rtsha ba'i
translated: and the unsurpassed yoga of the feast—

original: dal bla na med pa dang /_/dpa' bo dpa' mo rnal 'byor dbang phyug sogs/_/
analyzed: dal bla na med pa dang /_/dpa' bo dpa' mo rnal 'byor dbang phyug sogs/_/
translated: heroes, heroines, lords of yogins, and so forth,

original: mkha' 'gro'i tshhogs rnams brtshe bas dgongs su gsol/__/dngos grub rtsha ba rdo
analyzed: mkha' 'gro'i tshhogs rnams brtshe bas dgongs su gsol/__/dngos grub rtsha ba rdo
translated: assembly of ḍākinīs, please heed me.🔽I have been afflicted by the illness of great pride

original: rje slob dpon la/_/nga rgyal mthon po'i nad kyis bdag gzir te/_/bag med tshhul
analyzed: rje slob dpon la/_/nga rgyal mthon po'i nad kyis bdag gzir te/_/bag med tshhul
translated: toward the vajra master, the source of spiritual powers,🔽and have been disrespectful through carelessness—

original: gyis brnyas pa gang bgyis pa/_/bla ma rnam gsum sku la bzod par gsol/__/
analyzed: gyis brnyas pa gang bgyis pa/_/bla ma rnam gsum sku la bzod par gsol/__/
translated: I confess all such faults before the three kinds of gurus.

original: chos sku'i spros dang bral ba de nyid la/_/longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul skus
analyzed: chos sku'i spros dang bral ba de nyid la/_/longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul skus
translated: The dharmakāya is free from conceptual elaborations,

original: gzhan don mdzad/_/de'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i bka' rnams las/_/'das
analyzed: gzhan don mdzad/_/de'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i bka' rnams las/_/'das
translated: yet the saṃbhogakāya and nirmāṇakāya benefit others.🔽I have transgressed and disregarded🔽the words that come from their mouths—I confess all such faults.

original: shing khyad du bsad pa 'thol lo bshags/__/bla ma gcig dang rig ma gcig
analyzed: shing khyad du bsad pa 'thol lo bshags/__/bla ma gcig dang rig ma gcig
translated: One guru, one awareness partner,

original: nyid dang /_/dkyil 'khor gcig dang bye brag dus gzhan du/_/dam tshhig
analyzed: nyid dang /_/dkyil 'khor gcig dang bye brag dus gzhan du/_/dam tshhig
translated: and the same time,

original: gcig gis bsdus pa'i spun rnams la/_/khros shing nyes par brjod pa 'thol lo
analyzed: gcig gis bsdus pa'i spun rnams la/_/khros shing nyes par brjod pa 'thol lo
translated: I confess the transgression of speaking ill of them in anger.

original: bshags/__/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas snying po can/_/rgyal ba'i🔽rdo rje theg pa'i rtsha ba dang yan lag gi ltung ba'i bshags pa bzhugs so//
analyzed: bshags/__/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas snying po can/_/rgyal ba'i rdo rje theg pa'i rtsha ba dang yan lag gi ltung ba'i bshags pa bzhugs so//
translated: All sentient beings possess the essence of buddhahood,🔽and I have harmed them with the three poisons.🔽I confess the transgression of abandoning the supreme sons,

original: sras mchog dam par gyur pa la/_/bdag ni mi mkhas zhe sdang dbang gyur te/_/
analyzed: sras mchog dam par gyur pa la/_/bdag ni mi mkhas zhe sdang dbang gyur te/_/
translated: due to my own lack of skill and the power of anger.🔽I confess the transgression of abandoning loving-kindness,

original: byams sems phan bde spangs pa mthol lo bshags/__/chos rnams thams
analyzed: byams sems phan bde spangs pa mthol lo bshags/__/chos rnams thams
translated: benefit, and happiness.🔽All phenomena are bodhicitta,

original: cad byang chub sems yin te/_/kun rdzob don dam cha la ma rten cing /_/'jig
analyzed: cad byang chub sems yin te/_/kun rdzob don dam cha la ma rten cing /_/'jig
translated: but not relying on the conventional and ultimate aspects,🔽and being under the power of worldly concepts,

original: rten rnam rtog dbang du gyur pa yis/_/bde chen byang sems spangs pa 'thol lo
analyzed: rten rnam rtog dbang du gyur pa yis/_/bde chen byang sems spangs pa 'thol lo
translated: I confess the transgression of abandoning the bodhicitta of great bliss.

original: bshags/__/phyi rol pa dang nyan thos rang rgyal dang /_/theg pa che dang gsang sngags bla na med/_/lam tshhol ba dang de bzhin lam chen zhugs/_/grub
analyzed: bshags/__/phyi rol pa dang nyan thos rang rgyal dang /_/theg pa che dang gsang sngags bla na med/_/lam tshhol ba dang de bzhin lam chen zhugs/_/grub
translated: I confess the fault of revealing the profound secrets🔽to those who are not suitable vessels,

original: pa'i mtha' rnams smad pa 'thol lo bshags/__/snod min cho ga nyams dang ma
analyzed: pa'i mtha' rnams smad pa 'thol lo bshags/__/snod min cho ga nyams dang ma
translated: to those who have not received the empowerment,🔽to those who have not been ripened,

original: smin dang /_/zab mo gsang ba'i snod du mi rung la/_/gsang sngags phyag rgya brda
analyzed: smin dang /_/zab mo gsang ba'i snod du mi rung la/_/gsang sngags phyag rgya brda
translated: and to those who are not suitable vessels for the profound secrets,🔽and of revealing the profound secrets of the Secret Mantra,

original: dang sngags la sogs/_/zab mo gsang ba bsgrags pa 'thol lo bshags/__/phung
analyzed: dang sngags la sogs/_/zab mo gsang ba bsgrags pa 'thol lo bshags/__/phung
translated: such as the mudras, symbols, and mantras.🔽I confess the fault of disparaging and regarding as inferior🔽the five aggregates, which are in actuality the five buddha families,

original: po lnga ni rgyal ba rigs lnga'i dngos/_/ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin yin pa la/_/
analyzed: po lnga ni rgyal ba rigs lnga'i dngos/_/ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin yin pa la/_/
translated: and the five wisdoms,

original: gsad bcad bdeg dang dka' thub bsnyung ba sogs/_/smad cing dman par
analyzed: gsad bcad bdeg dang dka' thub bsnyung ba sogs/_/smad cing dman par
translated: through killing, cutting, stealing, austerities, fasting, and so forth.🔽I confess the fault of labeling

original: brtags pa mthol lo bshags/__/chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin dag pa la/_/
analyzed: brtags pa mthol lo bshags/__/chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin dag pa la/_/
translated: all phenomena, which are by nature pure,🔽as existent or nonexistent, good or bad,

original: yin dang min dang bzang ngan gnyis su btags/_/rang bzhin dag pa'i chos
analyzed: yin dang min dang bzang ngan gnyis su btags/_/rang bzhin dag pa'i chos
translated: and of regarding the pure nature of phenomena

original: kyi dbyings nyid la/_/the tshhom som nyi zos pa 'thol lo bshags/__/bla ma
analyzed: kyi dbyings nyid la/_/the tshhom som nyi zos pa 'thol lo bshags/__/bla ma
translated: about the very expanse of reality.🔽I confess the mistake of not having faith🔽in the guru, the Three Jewels, and the Secret🔽Mantrayāna,

original: dang ni dkon mchog gsum rnams dang /_/gsang sngags rdo rje theg la mi mos
analyzed: dang ni dkon mchog gsum rnams dang /_/gsang sngags rdo rje theg la mi mos
translated: and of not having respect🔽for those who disparage them.🔽I confess the mistake of not having🔽cut through the net of doubts🔽and of having acted with love

original: shing /_/smod cing bkur pa 'debs pa'i mi rnams la/_/tshhar ma bcad cing
analyzed: shing /_/smod cing bkur pa 'debs pa'i mi rnams la/_/tshhar ma bcad cing
translated: toward those who do not believe in the Secret🔽Mantrayāna.

original: byams bgyis 'thol lo bshags/__/ming rnams thams cad rnam par rtag pa
analyzed: byams bgyis 'thol lo bshags/__/ming rnams thams cad rnam par rtag pa
translated: I confess the mistake of having🔽labeled as existent and nonexistent

original: ste/_/rtog pas stong pa'i ye shes chen po nyid/_/de la zug rngu rdul tsham med pa la//
analyzed: ste/_/rtog pas stong pa'i ye shes chen po nyid/_/de la zug rngu rdul tsham med pa la//
translated: the great wisdom of emptiness,🔽which is the true nature of all names.

original: yin dang min du btags pa 'thol lo bshags/__/dang po'i las can byis🔽pa'i ngang tshhul can/_/dad ldan lung gi rjes su 'brang rnams la/_/zab mo'i
analyzed: yin dang min du btags pa 'thol lo bshags/__/dang po'i las can byis pa'i ngang tshhul can/_/dad ldan lung gi rjes su 'brang rnams la/_/zab mo'i
translated: I confess the mistake of having🔽caused others to lose faith🔽by teaching the conduct of the tantric

original: tshhig brjod brtul zhugs spyod bstan pas/_/pha rol sems sun phyung ba 'thol
analyzed: tshhig brjod brtul zhugs spyod bstan pas/_/pha rol sems sun phyung ba 'thol
translated: vows to those who are beginners,🔽who are of a childish nature,

original: lo bshags/__/mi spangs spyad cing bsrung bar bya ba dang /_/shes par bya
analyzed: lo bshags/__/mi spangs spyad cing bsrung bar bya ba dang /_/shes par bya
translated: and who follow the scriptures.

original: ba'i dam tshhig yan lag bcas/_/shes bzhin khyad du gsad nas mi rten pa/_/
analyzed: ba'i dam tshhig yan lag bcas/_/shes bzhin khyad du gsad nas mi rten pa/_/
translated: I have not relied on them, having disregarded conscientiousness.🔽I confess these transgressions with a mind of deep regret.

original: rab tu 'gyod pa'i sems kyis 'thol lo bshags/__/phyi nang gsang ba'i shes
analyzed: rab tu 'gyod pa'i sems kyis 'thol lo bshags/__/phyi nang gsang ba'i shes
translated: I have disparaged the sublime wisdom of the outer, inner, and secret🔽and the unsurpassed knowledge consorts, common and special,

original: rab dam pa dang /_/thun mongs khyad par rig ma bla med la/_/skyon dang nyes pa'i sgo nas smad gyur pa/_/nyon mongs kun nas blang ba 'thol lo bshags//
analyzed: rab dam pa dang /_/thun mongs khyad par rig ma bla med la/_/skyon dang nyes pa'i sgo nas smad gyur pa/_/nyon mongs kun nas blang ba 'thol lo bshags//
translated: with faults and shortcomings. I confess these transgressions with a mind of deep regret.

original: bshags dang bshags par bya ba mi dmigs kyang /_/rnam par rtog pa'i bag
analyzed: bshags dang bshags par bya ba mi dmigs kyang /_/rnam par rtog pa'i bag
translated: Although neither confession nor that to be confessed is observed,🔽in order to purify the habitual tendencies of conceptual thoughts,

original: chags sbyang bya'i phyir/_/rje btshun dam pa yul gyi mchog rnams la/_/rab tu
analyzed: chags sbyang bya'i phyir/_/rje btshun dam pa yul gyi mchog rnams la/_/rab tu
translated: I confess these transgressions to the most sublime objects, the holy masters,

original: bshags pas bde ba thob gyur cig🔽/  dam tshhig mi ldan rig ma brten pa dang /_/tshhogs 'khor la sogs nang du
analyzed: bshags pas bde ba thob gyur cig /  dam tshhig mi ldan rig ma brten pa dang /_/tshhogs 'khor la sogs nang du
translated: and thereby may I attain bliss.🔽I have relied on knowledge consorts who do not have the commitments,🔽I have boasted in ganacakra gatherings,

original: brtshod pa dang /_/rig ma dman la bdud rtshi blangs pa dang /_/gsang chos
analyzed: brtshod pa dang /_/rig ma dman la bdud rtshi blangs pa dang /_/gsang chos
translated: and I have taken the nectar of the knowledge consort of lesser capacity.🔽I confess these transgressions with a mind of deep regret.

original: 'dod pa'i snod la ma bshad dang /_/dad ldan chos min gtam la sbyar ba dang // nyan thos nang du zhag bdun 'das pa dang /_/ming tsham la rten sngags pa yin
analyzed: 'dod pa'i snod la ma bshad dang /_/dad ldan chos min gtam la sbyar ba dang // nyan thos nang du zhag bdun 'das pa dang /_/ming tsham la rten sngags pa yin
translated: Staying more than seven days with the Shravakas,🔽And being a mantra practitioner who relies on mere words,

original: smra dang /_/snod min pa la sngags bshad nyes pa dang /_/sgom bzlas la sogs
analyzed: smra dang /_/snod min pa la sngags bshad nyes pa dang /_/sgom bzlas la sogs
translated: Explaining the mantras to unsuitable recipients,🔽And the faults of contradicting and confusing🔽The meditation, recitation, and so forth,

original: 'gal 'khrul gyur pa dang /_/lta spyod la sogs ma dag nyes pa rnams/_/
analyzed: 'gal 'khrul gyur pa dang /_/lta spyod la sogs ma dag nyes pa rnams/_/
translated: And the faults of impurity in the view, conduct, and so forth,🔽I request forbearance from the compassionate protector.

original: mgon po thugs rje can la bzod par gsol/_/tshhangs pa'i dngos grub myur du
analyzed: mgon po thugs rje can la bzod par gsol/_/tshhangs pa'i dngos grub myur du
translated: Swiftly bestow the siddhi of the sky-farers.🔽I confess the violations of the commitments of body.

original: stshal du gsol/_/sku'i dam tshhig nyams pa 'thol lo bshags/_/gsung gi dam🔽tshhig nyams pa 'thol lo bshags/_/thugs kyi dam tshhig nyams pa 'thol lo
analyzed: stshal du gsol/_/sku'i dam tshhig nyams pa 'thol lo bshags/_/gsung gi dam tshhig nyams pa 'thol lo bshags/_/thugs kyi dam tshhig nyams pa 'thol lo
translated: I confess the violations of the commitments of speech.🔽I confess the violations of the commitments of mind.🔽I confess the violations of the commitments of the wrathful ones.

original: bshags/_/rtsha ba'i dam tshhig nyams pa 'thol lo bshags/_/yan lag dam
analyzed: bshags/_/rtsha ba'i dam tshhig nyams pa 'thol lo bshags/_/yan lag dam
translated: I confess the violations of the branch commitments.

original: tshhig nyams pa 'thol lo bshags/_/'thol lo 'thol lo ye shes lha la 'thol/_/
analyzed: tshhig nyams pa 'thol lo bshags/_/'thol lo 'thol lo ye shes lha la 'thol/_/
translated: I confess, I confess, I confess to the wisdom deities.

original: bshags so bshags so dam can mkha' 'gro'i tshhogs/_/'thol bshags phul
analyzed: bshags so bshags so dam can mkha' 'gro'i tshhogs/_/'thol bshags phul
translated: I offer this open confession.

original: rdo rje theg pa'i rtsha ba dang yan lag gi ltung ba'i bshags pa bzhugs so//
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa'i rtsha ba dang yan lag gi ltung ba'i bshags pa bzhugs so//
translated: The Confession of Downfalls of the Vajrayāna Root and Branch

original: nas tshhangs pa'i dngos grub stshol/_/zhes bshags so/_/rdo rje theg pa'i rtsha ba
analyzed: nas tshhangs pa'i dngos grub stshol/_/zhes bshags so/_/rdo rje theg pa'i rtsha ba
translated: Having offered this confession, I seek the spiritual powers of the sky-farers.🔽The Confession of Downfalls of the Vajrayāna Root and Branch

original: dang yan lag gi ltung ba'i bshags pa/_slob dpon in tra bo d+his mdzad pa
analyzed: dang yan lag gi ltung ba'i bshags pa/_slob dpon in tra bo d+his mdzad pa
translated: Composed by Master Indrabhūti

original: rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: rdzogs so//_//
translated: is complete.
